title: Player interaction in game has left me unsettled.
body:
I was extremely unsettled by a game I recently had on my smurf, my friend was streaming, and one of the players on our team was raging at us the entire game, telling us to kill ourselves, and saying things like we should blow our brains off on stream. 
Is there a separate avenue to report someone with this behavior? Should I be reporting someone like this through a separate avenue than the after game area?
